'''2.2.8908''' ({{w|Microsoft Windows|Windows}}), '''2.2.8907''' ({{w|Microsoft Windows|Windows}}, via the {{w|Microsoft Store}}/{{W|Xbox (app)|Xbox app}}), '''2.2.8909''' ({{w|macOS}}), or '''2.2.8906''' ({{w|Linux}}), is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on January 18, 2022.

== Changes ==
* Updated how checkboxes within Installations tab work.
* Updated user sign out flow for Mojang account users when they migrate to Microsoft account.

== Fixes ==
* {{Bug|MCL-18431}} - Skin preview doesn't show transparent pixels.
* {{Bug|MCL-19984}} - Java Edition shows Demo with active Xbox Game Pass subscription.
* {{Bug|MCL-20247}} - Can't change version.
* {{Bug|MCL-20282}} - Minecraft for Windows' uninstall warning is reused from Dungeons.</onlyinclude>
